title: where do i report someone offering to boost me?
body:
got a random message from someone i've never played with in a match that said:

"Hey. I was the person that carried earlier. I was boosting. I thought you might be interested since its cheap atm www.xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx.com/boost"

i looked up the account and it is a level 5 with no recent matches.  i want to report, but don't know where and i think its against the board rules to post the summoner name.

EDIT: i took out the website name....don't want to give them free publicity

replies.body: Thanks for removing the link!  We do have ways of thwarting spam sites and malicious messages, but you can also report it to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Thanks for helping us keep the community safe!
ok will do.  thanks for the reply!
